input.description: adapter name [Optional] The name of the adapter that is enabled on the Peer. The default adapter name is HPSEActor

1. Provides name of the Zone Set specified.
Sample Request XML: <items> <item> <command>list</command> <category>zoneset</category> <process-id>find-zone-set-details</process-id> <command-arguments> <zoneset-id>1001</zoneset-id> </command-arguments> </item> </items>
Parameters Description:
command[Required] The actual command type that will be executed. category[Required] This parameter identifies the top-level functional category. process-id[Required] Unique identifier for the process workflow. zoneset-id[Required] id of the zoneset to be updated. zoneset-id[Required] id of the zoneset whose details are required.
2. Lists the zones that are contained within the zone set specified.
Sample Request XML: <items> <item> <command>list</command> <category>zoneset</category> <process-id>find-zone-set-details</process-id> <command-arguments> <zone/> <zoneset-id>1001</zoneset-id> </command-arguments> </item> </items>
Parameters Description:
command[Required] The actual command type that will be executed. category[Required] This parameter identifies the top-level functional category. process-id[Required] Unique identifier for the process workflow. zoneset-id[Required] id of the zoneset to be updated. zoneset-id[Required] id of the zoneset whose details are required. zone[Required] Indicates that details of zones contained within zoneset are required.
3. Provides a detailed description of the elements that are contained within the zone set specified.
Sample Request XML: <items> <item> <command>show</command> <category>zoneset</category> <process-id>find-zone-set-details</process-id> <command-arguments> <zoneset-id>1001</zoneset-id> </command-arguments> </item> </items>
Parameters Description:
command[Required] The actual command type that will be executed. category[Required] This parameter identifies the top-level functional category. process-id[Required] Unique identifier for the process workflow. zoneset-id[Required] id of the zoneset to be updated. zoneset-id[Required] id of the zoneset whose details are required.
4. Provides a detailed description of the zones that are contained within the zone set specified.
Sample Request XML: <items> <item> <command>show</command> <category>zoneset</category> <process-id>find-zone-set-details</process-id> <command-arguments> <zone/> <zoneset-id>1001</zoneset-id> </command-arguments> </item> </items>
Parameters Description:
command[Required] The actual command type that will be executed. category[Required] This parameter identifies the top-level functional category. process-id[Required] Unique identifier for the process workflow. zoneset-id[Required] id of the zoneset to be updated. zoneset-id[Required] id of the zoneset whose details are required. zone[Required] Indicates that details of zones contained within zoneset are required.

documentation.description:
This wrapper supports the following requirements:-
1. Lists the elements that are contained within the zone set specified. 2. Lists the zones that are contained within the zone set specified. 3. Provides a detailed description of the zone set specified. 4. Provides a detailed description of the zones that are contained within the zone set specified.
